entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
